job_title: Staff RN in El Centro, CA
pros: A job. Some RN's great, friendly and helpful
cons: Unsafe care, these violations would be pointed out but nothing was done. They burn the fields after the crop is harvested, causing a brown atmospherics, this will cause problems if you have any type of respiratory issue. That same brown thick air is then pumped into patients rooms by antiquated window air conditioners. If you do not speak Spanish you are left out of most discussions that staff may be having when sitting around the nurses station. Management some good and some very very bad. Other RN's correcting you in front of a patient. To make it worse their solution was incorrect. .

review_title: Left under adverse conditions after 26 years. HR believed a liar.  HR very partial. Managment a joke
pros: The staff  very friendly and family like. Small town like atmosphere. Patients very thankful for your care and usually are related to a staff member.
cons: management is anti staff, mandatory overtime due to lack of staff. Mandatory floating. Very $$$ conscious. Sometimes working with old equipment. Earthquakes.
Too many new grads working and not alot of experienced people.
